captions.text:
- The only k-pop I know
is PSY in Gangnam Style.
- I know how to say squirrel.
- I don't expect them to do too well.
- This would be easier with like, a shot.

- I didn't know PSY I
wasn't his real name.
I feel like everything is a lie.

- It's like, they're like
doing this sound that,
maybe it's like not natural to English.
Um, one of these letters is solid.
I can't get my head straight.

- A lot of times my mind will
translate it to English for me
so it'd be like oh tech young,
And that's like, probably not the way
- I would just call the person OK.
Oh, we're doing a K-Pop star.

- It's another one of those
H's that sneaks in there.
- Ooh, I was so far off.

That's the hardest thing
I've ever heard in my life.

- I'm used to saying like
bae as in like my bae.

- We think it's pretty good,
it's not pretty good though.

I've actually heard of this
guy, he's pretty popular.
- I'm not even gonna try that.

- The solid L, that's
just throwing me off.
- Oh, no, no, let me try again.
- I don't hear the R's being pronounced.
Ooh, that last part's so hard.
- I literally can't hear it, it's science.
- I don't think I did very well at all.

- My lips weren't able to move
like they were supposed to.
- I can't trust anything or anyone anymore
knowing that PSY isn't his real name.
- I think these are very pretty names.

- You know, people pronounce
my name wrong all the time.
- PSY is my favorite because I feel like
he's just whacky and cool and that's

I guess we all have a
little bit of weird in us.

comments.author: Sky_Hi 4EunKyu (아우로라)

comments.text:
I'm not sure why people seem to think this would be easy. It is only easy 
if you have some idea about how the language uses sounds. If you don't 
know, you are going to use the wrong system. Even within a language there 
is variation for things like accents, so of course they are not going to 
instinctively know what the correct pronunciation is for the name. Yeah, it 
can be frustrating to have people say a name wrong but that is what happens 
when you have people all speaking differently. Just explain it and hope 
they can pick it up.﻿

comments.author: princessnicki63

comments.text:
Literally, I've come to realize people just try too hard to pronounce the 
names
I have a friend who when I have him pronounce kpop names he just goes 'fuck 
it' and tries it and he usually gets it right
He even got names like Taecyeon, Ryeowook, Hakyeon, Seohyun, and Chaerin 
mostly correct
Then I have another friend who tries super hard to pronounce it right and 
he always screws up
A lot of the time with Korean names you just need to relax and pronounce 
how it looks, because they aren't that hard. The only time I tripped up my 
first friend was when I cheated and had him pronounce Zhoumi, even though 
Zhoumi isn't Korean
comments.author: Skylar Aru
